hero.title: Pick a tool without leaving your stream
hero.body: Use the Sub Toolbox button in Stremio's subtitle list. Your saved API keys, target languages, and cache come with you automatically.

toast.title: New stream detected
toast.meta: A different episode is playing in Stremio.

translate.title: Translate SRT files
translate.body: Upload .srt/.vtt/.ass files and keep cache + language preferences intact.

embedded.title: Extract + Translate
embedded.body: Extract embedded subtitles from the current stream or file, then translate with your provider.

sync.title: Sync subtitles
sync.body: Fix timing drifts with offsets or the Chrome extension and save back to your session.

auto.title: Automatic subtitles
auto.body: Create subs when none exist. Uses your target language and provider settings.

logs.linkedChanged: Linked stream changed. Outputs cleared; run extraction again for the new stream.
logs.linkedPending: New stream detected. It will switch after the current extraction/translation finishes.
logs.noProgress: No extraction progress for {minutes} minute(s). Resetting extraction; please retry.
logs.cacheSaveFailed: Failed to save track {id} to cache: {reason}
logs.extensionMissing: Extension not detected yet. Install SubMaker xSync and wait for detection.
logs.invalidUrl: Invalid stream URL. Paste a full http/https link.
logs.selectSubtitle: Select a subtitle in Step 1 outputs first.
logs.filteredBinaryTracks: Omitted {count} binary track(s); showing text subtitles only.

downloads.selectPrompt: Select a subtitle in Step 1 outputs to unlock this step.

meta.pageSubtitle: Extract embedded tracks from your current stream and translate them instantly.
meta.title: Title: {title}

instructions.title: Embedded Subtitles Instructions

extractionSteps.1: Make sure the xSync extension is installed and detected.
extractionSteps.2: Make sure the linked stream is the movie/episode you want to extract/translate.
extractionSteps.3: Right-click Stremio's stream and click "Copy stream link".
extractionSteps.4: Paste the stream URL in the corresponding box.
extractionSteps.5: Use "Complete" for MKV streams (non-MKV links auto-switch to Smart).

translationSteps.1: Verify and select the desired subtitles.
translationSteps.3: Select translation settings and translation provider.

instructions.download: You can download both extracted or translated subtitles as SRT.
instructions.upload: Translated subtitles are automatically uploaded to the database, matching the video hash, under the "xEmbed (Language)" entry (reload the stream on Stremio to see it).
instructions.retry: If translation/sync problems happen, simply retranslate the subtitle to overwrite the xEmbed database cache.
instructions.originals: Extracted subtitles are saved to xEmbed as originals and show up under their source language (no separate label).
instructions.ocrNote: Currently doesn't work with image-based subtitles - OCR may be implemented.

hero.notice: If you use AIOStreams PROXY for Real-Debrid, completely exit all streams before running this tool.

step1.title: Provide Stream Information
step1.streamPlaceholder: Paste the video/stream URL from Stremio or your browser
step1.modeHelper:
In Complete mode, the whole file will be fetched for extraction.
Complete mode is needed for MKV files.
step1.hashMismatchInline: Hashes do not match. Extraction stays blocked until the pasted URL matches your linked stream.
step1.hashMismatchLine1: Hashes must match before extraction can start.
step1.outputsEmpty: No tracks extracted yet. Run extraction above to see them here.

step2.title: Tracks & Translation
step2.helper: Select a track in Step 1 outputs, then choose a target language and translate.
step2.selectedPlaceholder: Select a subtitle in Step 1 outputs to unlock this step.
step2.providerHelper: Uses your configured model for the selected provider.
step2.outputsEmpty: No translations yet. Pick a track and translate to see them here.
step2.reloadHint: Done! Reload the stream subtitle list in Stremio to see xEmbed (Language) entries.
step2.reloadHintManual: Hash mismatch detected; translations were saved locally. Download the SRT above and drag it into Stremio manually.

autoSubs.heroSubtitle: Generate subtitles with Whisper then translate

extension.note: Extension ping is status-only; local Whisper engine is not available yet.

sections.setup: Link a stream & prep the model

steps.streamNote: We'll fetch and extract audio; protected/DRM streams won't work.
steps.pipeline: We'll stitch: fetch -> segment -> transcribe -> align -> translate (optional) -> deliver SRT.
steps.downloadsNote: We'll enable downloads after the pipeline finishes.

status.previewPlan: Pipeline: fetch -> transcribe -> align -> translate -> deliver.

hash.mismatch: Hash mismatch: linked {linked} vs pasted {stream}. Cache uploads disabled.

logs.noTargets: Select at least one target language or disable translation.
logs.sendingRequest: Sending request to Cloudflare Workers AI...
logs.cacheSkipped: Cache uploads were skipped due to hash mismatch.

toolbox.footnote: Toolbox is tied to your current session and stream. Keep this tab open while streaming for the smoothest handoff.

footer.love: Made with ❤️ for Stremio users everywhere
footer.thanks: Thank you for using SubMaker! Your support helps make content accessible to everyone.

instructions.title: How to Use SubMaker
instructions.step1: Add desired API keys to "Subtitles Sources" section.
instructions.step2: Add a Gemini API Key to AI section.
instructions.stremioBody:
1. Fetch all Source and Target languages subtitles from sources.
2. Create "Make [Target Language]" buttons within the subtitles list.
3. All "Make" translation lists are in the same order of the Source language list.
instructions.whenBody:
When a subtitle is clicked within the "Make" translation lists, it'll start translation.
After 20-30 seconds, reload the same subtitle entry.
It'll load translated!
instructions.quickTip: Quick Tip: If a translation looks off, broken, or out of sync, quickly triple-click that subtitle in the list to force a fresh re-translation.
instructions.ps:
PS:
Partial translation is delivered in batches so you can start watching almost instantly.
Complete translation may take from 30 seconds-5 minutes depending on movie/episode length.
instructions.onlyOneSourceBody:
When the "Make" translation lists are created, they load the subtitles list in the same order of the source language.
That means you can test the source language subtitles for the correct sync and only then select the same one on the translation list instead of translating unsync'd subtitles.

toolbox.title: 🧰 Sub Toolbox Instructions
toolbox.beta:
BETA: New toolbox features are coming soon.
For now, enjoy seamless batch SRT file translations with all your configured AI providers and settings.
toolbox.step1: Enable "Sub Toolbox" on the config page before installing.
toolbox.step2: In Stremio, open the subtitles list and click "Sub Toolbox".
toolbox.step3: Right-click the playing stream/video in Stremio and choose "Download Subtitles" to launch the toolbox in your browser.
toolbox.step4: Pick a tool: Extract & translate embedded subs, Translate subtitle files, Synchronize subtitles, or Automatic subtitles.
toolbox.step5: Each tool opens in your browser using your saved SubMaker session and AI provider settings.
toolbox.step6: Follow the on-screen steps, then drag the result back into Stremio if needed.

reset.title: Reset All Settings
reset.intro: This will reset literally everything for this site:
reset.item1: - Local storage, session storage, cached config and tokens
reset.item3: - Any site data stored by this app

noTranslation.title: Just Fetch Subtitles (No Translation)

All subtitles from this language will be available for translation in the translation selector AND will be fetched (original subtitles will show up).

subsource.title: SubSource
subsource.description: Get your free API key from

subdl.title: SubDL
subdl.description: Get your free API key from

main.label: Main Provider
main.description: Choose which enabled AI provider to use when multiple are configured.

secondary.label:
Secondary Provider
If the main provider errors (429/503/prohibited/other), retry the failed batch with this provider, then continue with the main provider.

fallback.label: Fallback Provider
fallback.description: Used only when the main provider returns an error. Falls back seamlessly.

providersUi.deeplHint: Free keys auto-use api-free.deepl.com. Language codes are auto-mapped from your selections.
providersUi.cfworkersHint: Use ACCOUNT|TOKEN to set account ID explicitly.
providersUi.googleHint: Uses the public Google Translate web endpoint (may be unstable).

apiKey.label: Gemini API Key
apiKey.helper: Get your free API key from

model.label: Translation Model
model.hintBody: Quickly triple-click the subtitle to force a re-translation.
model.betaTitle: ⚡ 2.5 Pro usage is still in Beta.
model.betaAdvice: If you have translation problems, use Flash-Lite.
model.rateWarningBody: If using a free API key, Gemini 2.5 Pro may trigger rate limits (HTTP 429). You'll likely only be able to translate one subtitle at a time.

languageCards.targetLabel: * Target languages for subtitles and translations
languageCards.learnDescription: Creates "Learn (Language)" entries that pair source + translated lines in WebVTT. Select target "Learn" languages above after enabling.

learnMode.label: Learn Mode
learnMode.description: Adds "Learn (Language)" entries that output dual-language WebVTT with source and translated lines for language learning.
learnMode.orderDescription: Choose which language appears at the top and bottom of the screen.

workflow.label: Translation Workflow
workflow.description: Switching between modes is recommended if you have translation sync problems. Our main translation workflow removes timestamps and sends the subtitles numbered to the AI, then reconstructs the SRT with the original timestamps. "Send Timestamps to AI" sends the subtitles WITH timecodes and trusts the AI to return correct timestamps. Added for future-proofing the addon.

promptStyle.label: Prompt Style
promptStyle.description: Choose between strict structure preservation or natural flow adaptation

options.natural: Natural - Adapts structure for natural target language flow
options.strict: Strict - Preserves exact timing and structure

database.label: SubMaker Database
database.description: Choose how to handle the SubMaker translation database. The main database caches translations permanently to reduce API usage. Bypass mode forces fresh translations and stores them temporarily (12 hours).

chunking.label: Chunking Strategy
chunking.description: Multiple Batches sends subtitles in separate requests (chunks). Single-Batch translates the whole subtitle file in one go (still auto-splits into 2 or 3 chunks at 50k and 100k+ tokens). Single-Batch still streams partial outputs while processing (through token streaming) and delivers better contextual translations. Might cause MAX_OUTPUT errors. Long titles may have more sync problems.

multiProvider.label: Multiple providers (beta)
multiProvider.description: Enables multiple providers and advanced parameters settings.

subToolbox.label: Enable "Sub Toolbox" (Alpha)
subToolbox.description: Shows the Sub Toolbox entry in Stremio subtitles for brower access to all tools. (Read instructions after enabling)
subToolbox.instructionsLink: Read instructions for using the Toolbox

mobileMode.label: Mobile Mode (fix/workaround)
mobileMode.description: Stremio makes only 1 request for subtitles and caches it, so subtitles in Android can't be partially delivered. Mobile Mode holds translation requests and sends the final subtitle only when ready. Use this if you're watching on Android/iOS. No partial translations, no loading messages. Might freeze the stream until translation is ready. Flash-lite recommended. Wait 1-3 min, if it doesn't load automatically switch subtitles back and forth to load the translation.

betaMode.label: Beta Mode
betaMode.description: Unlocks experimental features like Multiple Providers and Advanced Settings.

advancedGemini.title: Advanced Settings (Gemini)
advancedGemini.infoBody: Override default Gemini model and sampling parameters.
advancedGemini.cacheNotePrefix: When any Gemini setting is changed from defaults,
advancedGemini.cacheNoteSuffix: to ensure your experimental translations don't pollute the shared database.

model.label: Translation Model Override
model.description: Override the default model. Leave empty to use system default (gemini-flash-latest).

thinking.label: Thinking Budget (Extended Reasoning)
thinking.description: 0 = disabled, -1 = dynamic (auto-adjust), or fixed token count (1-32768). Higher values = deeper reasoning but slower.

temperature.label: Temperature (Creativity)
temperature.description: Controls randomness (0.0-2.0). Lower = more deterministic, Higher = more creative. Default: 0.8

topP.label: Top-P (Nucleus Sampling)
topP.description: Probability threshold (0.0-1.0). Lower = more focused, Higher = more diverse. Default: 0.95

batchContext.label: Enable Batch Context (Experimental)
batchContext.description: Include original surrounding context and previous translations when processing batches. Improves translation coherence but may break outputs and increases token usage. Disabled by default.

contextSize.label: Context Size
contextSize.description: Number of surrounding entries to include as context (1-10). Default: 3

providerAdvanced.title: Advanced Parameters
providerAdvanced.intro: Fine-tune generation settings for every enabled provider. These apply in multi-provider mode only.
providerAdvanced.empty: Enable a provider above to unlock its parameters.

labels.preserveFormattingHint: Keep line breaks, casing, and tags intact

openai.title: OpenAI Parameters

deepl.title: DeepL Parameters
deepl.footer: Beta languages auto-enable quality_optimized and disable latency_optimized.

instructions.step1: Upload your subtitle file(s) (any supported format, up to {max} at once)
instructions.step3: Click "Translate" and wait for the magic

provider.label: Translation Provider
provider.helper: Choose which configured provider to use for this translation.

flow.label: Translation Flow
flow.helper: Choose between multiple batches or a single batch run.

timing.label: Timestamps Strategy
timing.helper: Decide how timestamps are handled during translation.

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.highlightTitle: Fine-tune AI behavior for this translation only:
advanced.highlightNote: These settings are temporary and won't be saved to your config.

model.label: Translation Model Override
model.helper: Override the default model for this translation only.

thinking.label: Thinking Budget (Extended Reasoning)
thinking.helper: 0 = disabled, -1 = dynamic (auto-adjust), or fixed token count (1-32768).

temperature.label: Temperature (Creativity)
temperature.helper: Controls randomness (0.0-2.0). Lower = deterministic, Higher = creative. Default: 0.8

reasoning.label: Reasoning Effort
reasoning.helper: Applies to reasoning-capable OpenAI-style models. Leave blank for default.

topP.label: Top-P (Nucleus Sampling)
topP.helper: Probability threshold (0.0-1.0). Lower = focused, Higher = diverse. Default: 0.95

topK.label: Top-K (Token Selection)
topK.helper: Number of top tokens to consider (1-100). Default: 40

maxTokens.label: Max Output Tokens
maxTokens.helper: Maximum tokens in output (1-200000). Defaults follow your selected provider.

preserveFormatting.label: Preserve Formatting
preserveFormatting.helper: Keep line breaks, casing, and tags intact (DeepL only).

timeout.label: Translation Timeout (seconds)
timeout.helper: Maximum time to wait for translation (5-600). Defaults follow your selected provider.

retries.label: Max Retries
retries.helper: Number of retry attempts for this translation (0-5). Default: 2

queue.limitFull: You already have {max} files in the queue. Clear it to add more.

resetModal.title: Reset File Translation
resetModal.lead: This will reset everything for this tool:
resetModal.bullet1: Clear queued jobs, selections, and any downloaded results
resetModal.bullet2: Remove saved preferences (themes, dismissed tips) for this page
resetModal.bullet3: You'll be reloaded on the same file translation page afterward.

provider.using: Using {main}{mainModel} from your saved SubMaker config.

errors.configMissing: Missing configuration token. Open this page again from Stremio or the configure page.
errors.noFiles: Please select at least one subtitle file (SRT, VTT, ASS, SSA).
errors.sourceMissing: Please select a source language for DeepL translations

sync.title: Subtitles Sync Studio
sync.subtitle: Automatically synchronize subtitles with your video using audio analysis
sync.sectionHeading: Link your stream, choose a subtitle, and sync

instructions.title: Subtitle Sync Instructions

items.manual: Manual Offset: Adjust subtitle timing manually with positive/negative milliseconds when you don't want to run autosync.
items.fingerprint: Fast Fingerprint Pre-pass: Coarse ffsubsync fingerprint check to lock the big offset before deeper scans (on by default).
items.alass: ALASS (audio -> subtitle): Fast wasm anchors against the audio; pick Rapid/Balanced/Deep/Complete profiles for coverage.
items.ffsubsync: FFSubSync (audio -> subtitle): Drift-aware audio alignment via ffsubsync-wasm; choose a light, balanced, deep, or complete scan.
items.vosk: Vosk CTC/DTW (text -> audio): Force-align your subtitle text directly to audio with Vosk logits + DTW, great for broken timings or big offsets.
items.whisper: Whisper + ALASS (subtitle -> subtitle): Whisper transcript alignment with an ALASS refinement pass; use light/balanced/deep/complete profiles to control scan size.

instructions.note: Select a primary engine first, then pick its scan profile. Coverage adapts to the detected runtime so heavy cases can get deeper scans.

toast.title: New stream detected
toast.meta: A different episode is playing in Stremio.

step1.title: Provide Stream Information
step1.placeholder: Paste your stream URL here (e.g., http://... or magnet:...)
step1.infoBody: Autosync needs the stream URL and the xSync extension; manual offsets work without them.

step2.title: Select Subtitle to Sync
step2.uploadTitle: Or drag & drop your .srt file here

status.noStream: No stream linked. Manual offsets are fine, but autosync will need an http(s) stream URL.
status.invalidStream: Autosync requires a valid http(s) stream URL. Manual offsets can run without it.
status.needLanguage: Select the subtitle language before syncing.
status.extensionRequired: Autosync requires the SubMaker Chrome Extension. Please install/enable it.
status.urlRequired: Autosync requires a valid http(s) stream URL. Please paste it in Step 1.
status.profileRequired: Select a scan profile before starting autosync.

auto.fingerprintDescription: Runs a quick ffsubsync coarse offset pass on the first audio windows before your selected engine. Disable only if the audio is muted, heavily trimmed, or you want to skip the extra hop.

plan.fingerprintSkipped: Fingerprint pre-pass is skipped when FFSubSync is the primary engine.

rapid.label: Rapid anchors (~8-10%)
rapid.description: 4-6 short anchor windows for quick drift locking.

balanced.label: Balanced anchors (~14-18%)
balanced.description: 6-9 windows at ~60s for tougher bitrate shifts.

complete.label: Complete (full runtime)
complete.description: Scan the full runtime with alass anchors.

light.label: Light scan (~6-8%)
light.description: 4-6 windows (~60s) to catch obvious drifts quickly.

complete.label: Complete (full runtime)
complete.description: Full-runtime ffsubsync scan for maximum accuracy.

light.label: Vosk Light (~10-12%)
light.description: Quick CTC/DTW pass for big offsets and broken timings.

balanced.label: Vosk Balanced (~16-20%)
balanced.description: Adds more anchors for ads/drift while staying fast.

deep.label: Vosk Deep (~26-32%)
deep.description: Dense anchors for noisy audio or messy subs.

complete.label: Vosk Complete (full runtime)
complete.description: Full-runtime Vosk CTC/DTW alignment when accuracy is critical.

balanced.label: Balanced scan (~12-16%)
balanced.description: 5-8 windows (~85s) for typical shows with ads.

complete.label: Complete (full runtime)
complete.description: Full-runtime transcript + align when you need everything.

primary.manual: Manual offset: type the millisecond shift you need.
primary.alass: ALASS anchors the subtitle to audio for fast, offline alignment.
primary.ffsubsync: FFSubSync detects drifts/ads directly from the audio waveform.
primary.vosk: Vosk CTC/DTW force-aligns your subtitle text directly to the audio.
primary.whisper: Whisper transcript alignment with an ALASS refinement pass.

extension.unlocked: Sync engines unlocked (ALASS / FFSubSync / Vosk CTC/DTW / Whisper + ALASS)

translate.inProgress: Translating subtitle... This may take 1-5 minutes.
